pullrequest.title: Model: add a way to get scoped sensor name.

content.raw:
Thanks for the pull request! I started a few CI jobs:

* [Xenial no gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/471/)
* [Xenial Nvidia](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/120/)
* [homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1027/)

I mainly want to make sure the test passes and that adding a new model to the existing test world didn't break any existing tests.
content.html:
Thanks for the pull request! I started a few CI jobs:

  • Xenial no gpu
  • Xenial Nvidia
  • homebrew

I mainly want to make sure the test passes and that adding a new model to the existing test world didn't break any existing tests.
